sourceMeaningMnemonic: A (fresh water) <radical>tsunami</radical>. Some <radical>horns</radical>. The <radical>ground</radical>. A bunch of <radical>poop</radical>. Combine these together and let them decompose a while. You'll have yourself some very <kanji>nourishing</kanji> soil.
meaningInfo: The stuff in horns is great for fertilizer. So is poop. So is water (as long as it's fresh water). So nourishing!
readingMnemonic: This is the kind of <kanji>nourishing</kanji> soil that <reading>Je</reading>sus (<ja>じ</ja>) would make if he was into making soil, probably.
readingInfo: Imagine him making soil made out of those things. Jesus approves of this nourishing soil.
